dataList.name: The Knight of Despair
dataList.desc:
Takes -50% damage from [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], and [Sinking] (rounded down)
If this unit hits with a Cracked [SuperCoin], it does not activate the target's [Sinking] effect (does not consume Count either)

dataList.name: River of Helpless Tears
dataList.desc: Turn Start: if none of the swords on the field have [HelplessTear], apply [HelplessTear] to 1 random sword (once per turn; does not activate if a sword has [HelplessTear])

dataList.name: Hollow Pride
dataList.desc:
Turn End after getting Staggered for the first time: if there is a Sinner with 5+ [ColdBlackTear], uses an AoE Skill next turn
Turn End after getting Staggered for the first time: if all Sinners have [ColdBlackTear], gain [SignOfDespair] next turn

dataList.name: Shared Sorrow
dataList.desc:
When Staggered for the first time, recover from Stagger next turn; then, gain 10 [Protection] and 500 Shield every turn
Summon a Forgotten Knight's Sword next turn

dataList.name: Weathered Knight
dataList.desc:
Every time a sword pierces this unit, gain 1 [CollapsedPride], and [Protection] gained every turn is reduced by 3 while Shield HP gained every turn is reduced by 100
At 3 [CollapsedPride], this unit no longer gains [Protection] and Shield every turn, and instead becomes Staggered next turn and gains [WornOutKnight]

dataList.name: One Last Justice
dataList.desc: When this unit is hit by ARCANA[TabExplain] SLAVE while it has [WornOutKnight]: does not lose HP below 5%, and kills itself at Turn End

dataList.name: Shared Sorrow
dataList.desc:
When Staggered for the first time, recover from Stagger next turn; then, gain 10 [Protection] and 500 Shield every turn
Summon Heart-breaking Sword, Heart-tearing Sword, and Heart-piercing Sword next turn

dataList.name: One Last Justice
dataList.desc: When this unit is hit by ARCANA[TabExplain] SLAVE while it has [WornOutKnight] and is at less than 600 HP: does not lose HP below 5%, and kills itself at Turn End

dataList.name: Despair-piercing Sword
dataList.desc: If a sword with [HelplessTear] reaches 0 HP, it stabs the Knight of Despair

dataList.name: Sword of a Forgotten Knight
dataList.desc: If this unit hits with a Cracked [SuperCoin], it does not activate the target's [Sinking] effect

dataList.name: The Sword Points Toward Those Who Could Not be Protected
dataList.desc: If there is an enemy with [ChasingArcana], prioritizes that unit

dataList.name: Respite
dataList.desc:
This unit's HP does not drop below 1 when it does not have [HelplessTear]
Turn End: if this unit's HP drops to 1 when it does not have [HelplessTear], heals back to full HP

dataList.name: Despair-piercing Sword
dataList.desc: If a sword with [HelplessTear] reaches 0 HP, it stabs the Knight of Despair; then, transfers its Fatal Resistance value to 1 other random Sword next turn
